ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IKO Residential Sales Rep"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IKO Residential Manager")), RecordType.Name = "IKOPRO Homeowner", OR( ISCHANGED( Name ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit IKOPRO Homeowner Accounts.
